title: Plumdog
description: The irresistible illustrated diary of one very special London dog--the perfect gift book for dog lovers of all stripes (and spots!)Hello. My name is Plum and I'm a whoosell--a whippet mixed with Jack Russell and poodle. I especially like swimming, leaping, and croissants, and my favorite fragrance is fox poop. I live with Emma, an illustrator, and Rupert in London.Over the last year, I've been keeping a diary. Emma helped with the pictures, but the words are all mine.Since 2012 Emma Chichester Clark has been delighting followers with her blog Plumdog , which records the adventures, discoveries, wry observations, and social engagements of her dog, Plum. Now Plum's best pages are collected in this beautiful little storybook volume, which will delight anyone who has ever loved a dog.
author: Emma Chichester Clark
